WE ARE UBTECH

INNOVATION IS IN OUR DNA

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”off|phone” _builder_version=”4.9.0″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#efefef” custom_margin_last_edited=”off|phone” custom_padding=”25px||25px||true|false”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”||||false|true” custom_padding=”80px||80px||true|false” animation_style=”zoom”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.8.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _module_preset=”default” header_text_color=”#6B6B6B” header_font_size=”24px” header_letter_spacing=”1px” header_line_height=”1.5em” header_3_font_size=”20px” header_3_letter_spacing=”1px” header_3_line_height=”1.5em” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin_phone=”0px|0px|0px|0px|true|true” custom_margin_last_edited=”off|phone” custom_padding_phone=”0px||0px||true|true” custom_padding_last_edited=”off|desktop” animation_style=”flip” text_font_size_tablet=”20px” text_font_size_phone=”16px” text_font_size_last_edited=”off|desktop” header_font_size_tablet=”” header_font_size_phone=”15px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone”]

UBTECH is a global leading AI and humanoid robotics company founded in 2012. Born out of industry-leading breakthroughs first made in 2008 to digital servos – the core part that enables humanoid robots to move – UBTECH has grown its worldwide research, design, development, manufacturing, sales, and marketing capabilities to successfully launch an entire portfolio of world-class robots, including consumer humanoid robots, enterprise service robots, and STEM skill-building robots for kids at home with JIMU Robot and in the classroom through UBTECH Education.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.9.0″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#474747″ custom_padding=”25px||25px||true|false”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”50px||50px||true|false” animation_style=”slide”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.0″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” text_font_size=”40px” text_line_height=”1em” header_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_letter_spacing=”1px” header_line_height=”1.2em” text_orientation=”center” text_font_size_tablet=”30px” text_font_size_phone=”20px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” header_font_size_tablet=”30px” header_font_size_phone=”20px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone”]

MISSION & VALUES

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ custom_padding_last_edited=”off|phone” _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”50px||50px||true|false” custom_padding_phone=”|30px||30px|false|true” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”bottom”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.9.0″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.ubtechvietnam.com/ENG/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2021/03/Our_Story_10.png” title_text=”Our_Story_10″ align=”center” _builder_version=”4.9.0″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”||||false|true” custom_padding=”||||false|true”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_2_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_2_font_size=”24px” header_2_letter_spacing=”1px” header_2_line_height=”1.5em” custom_padding=”||||false|true” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”16px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|tablet” header_font_size_tablet=”” header_font_size_phone=”20px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” header_2_font_size_phone=”15px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”off|desktop”]

MISSION

To bring a robot into every home and business

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.9.0″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.ubtechvietnam.com/ENG/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2021/03/Our_Story_09.png” title_text=”Our_Story_09″ align=”center” _builder_version=”4.9.0″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”||||false|true” custom_padding=”||||false|true”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_2_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_2_font_size=”24px” header_2_letter_spacing=”1px” header_2_line_height=”1.5em” custom_padding=”||||false|true” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”16px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” header_font_size_tablet=”30px” header_font_size_phone=”20px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” header_2_font_size_phone=”15px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”off|desktop”]

VALUES

Cooperation, Respect, Quality, Innovation

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.9.0″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.ubtechvietnam.com/ENG/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2021/03/Our_Story_08.png” title_text=”Our_Story_08″ align=”center” _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”||||false|true” custom_padding=”||||false|true”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_2_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_2_font_size=”24px” header_2_letter_spacing=”1px” header_2_line_height=”1.5em” custom_padding=”||||false|true” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”16px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” header_font_size_tablet=”30px” header_font_size_phone=”20px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|tablet” header_2_font_size_phone=”15px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”off|desktop”]

VISION

A world where intelligent robots are integrated into the daily lives of everyone, creating a better way of life.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.9.0″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”||||true|true” UBTECH CULTURE

At UBTECH Robotics we are enhancing how we live, work, and play by bringing intelligent robots into every home and business. We are a dynamic, diverse, fast-growing company that values big ideas with global impact built through thoughtful, respectful collaboration. From the most advanced robots for enterprise deployment to JIMU Robots that inspire the engineers of the future, UBTECH aims to change the world by integrating robots into the daily lives of everyone for a more intelligent way of life.

border_color_all=”#000000″]

UBTECH EDUCATION

UBTECH Education is a division of UBTECH—a global leader in intelligent, humanoid robots for consumers, business, and industry—and we’re passionate about preparing all learners for the future of work. Our solutions establish the strong foundation students need to thrive: a high-quality STEM education integrated with the development of 21st century skills and computational literacy.

Born out of industry-leading breakthroughs first made in 2008 to digital servos – the core part that enables humanoid robots to move – UBTECH has grown its worldwide research, design, development, manufacturing, sales, and marketing […]
